name: NSwag
help: The project combines the functionality of Swashbuckle (Swagger generation) and AutoRest (client generation) in one toolchain. This way a lot of incompatibilites can be avoided and features which are not well described by the Swagger specification or JSON Schema are better supported (e.g. inheritance, enum and reference handling). The NSwag project heavily uses NJsonSchema for .NET for JSON Schema handling and C#/TypeScript class/interface generation.

tasks.help: List all types for the given assembly and settings.

properties.name: File
properties.help: The nswag.json configuration file path.

tasks.help: List all controllers classes for the given assembly and settings.

properties.name: File
properties.help: The nswag.json configuration file path.

properties.name: AllowReferencesWithProperties
properties.help: Use $ref references even if additional properties are defined on the object (otherwise allOf/oneOf with $ref is used, default: false).

properties.name: ClassNames
properties.help: The class names.

properties.name: DefaultDictionaryValueReferenceTypeNullHandling
properties.help: The default reference type null handling of dictionary value types (NotNull (default) or Null).

properties.name: DefaultEnumHandling
properties.help: The default enum handling ('String' or 'Integer'), default: Integer.

properties.name: DefaultPropertyNameHandling
properties.help: The default property name handling ('Default' or 'CamelCase').

properties.name: DefaultReferenceTypeNullHandling
properties.help: The default reference type null handling (Null (default) or NotNull).

properties.name: FlattenInheritanceHierarchy
properties.help: Flatten the inheritance hierarchy instead of using allOf to describe inheritance (default: false).

properties.name: GenerateKnownTypes
properties.help: Generate schemas for types in KnownTypeAttribute attributes (default: true).

properties.name: GenerateXmlObjects
properties.help: Generate xmlObject representation for definitions (default: false).

properties.name: IgnoreObsoleteProperties
properties.help: Ignore properties with the ObsoleteAttribute (default: false).

tasks.help: Generates a Swagger/OpenAPI specification for a controller or controlles contained in a .NET Web API assembly.
Generates a Swagger/OpenAPI specification for a controller or controlles contained in a .NET Web API assembly (obsolete: use webapi2openapi instead).

properties.name: AddMissingPathParameters
properties.help: Specifies whether to add path parameters which are missing in the action method (default: true).

properties.name: AspNetCore
properties.help: Specifies whether the controllers are hosted by ASP.NET Core.

properties.name: Controller
properties.help: The Web API controller full class name or empty to load all controllers from the assembly.

properties.name: Controllers
properties.help: The Web API controller full class names or empty to load all controllers from the assembly (comma separated).

properties.name: DefaultUrlTemplate
properties.help: The Web API default URL template (default for Web API: 'api/{controller}/{id}'; for MVC projects: '{controller}/{action}/{id?}').

properties.name: IncludedVersions
properties.help: The included API versions used by the ApiVersionProcessor (comma separated, default: empty = all).

properties.name: ResolveJsonOptions
properties.help: Specifies whether to resolve MvcJsonOptions to infer serializer settings (recommended, default: false, only available when IsAspNetCore is set).

tasks.help: Generates a Swagger specification ASP.NET Core Mvc application using ApiExplorer.
Generates a Swagger specification ASP.NET Core Mvc application using ApiExplorer (obsolete: use aspnetcore2openapi instead).

properties.name: ApiGroupNames
properties.help: The ASP.NET Core API Explorer group names to include (comma separated, default: empty = all).

properties.name: Configuration
properties.help: The configuration to use.

properties.name: MSBuildProjectExtensionsPath
properties.help: The MSBuild project extensions path. Defaults to "obj".

properties.name: NoBuild
properties.help: Don't build the project. Only use this when the build is up-to-date.

properties.name: NSwagWorkingDirectory
properties.help: The working directory to use.

properties.name: Project
properties.help: The project to use.

properties.name: RequireParametersWithoutDefault
properties.help: Parameters without default value are always required(i.e. api explorer info and only optional when default is set, legacy, default: false).

properties.name: Runtime
properties.help: The runtime to use.

properties.name: TargetFramework
properties.help: The target framework to use.

properties.name: Verbose
properties.help: Print verbose output.

tasks.help: Creates a new nswag.json file in the current directory.
Executes an .nswag file. If 'input' is not specified then all *.nswag files and the nswag.json file is executed.
Generates CSharp classes from a JSON Schema.

properties.name: AnyType
properties.help: The any .NET type (default: 'object').

properties.name: ArrayInstanceType
properties.help: The generic array .NET instance type (default: empty = ArrayType).

properties.name: ArrayType
properties.help: The generic array .NET type (default: 'ObservableCollection').

properties.name: DateTimeType
properties.help: The date time .NET type (default: 'DateTime').

properties.name: DictionaryInstanceType
properties.help: The generic dictionary .NET instance type (default: empty = DictionaryType).

properties.name: DictionaryType
properties.help: The generic dictionary .NET type (default: 'Dictionary').

properties.name: GenerateOptionalPropertiesAsNullable
properties.help: Specifies whether optional schema properties (not required) are generated as nullable properties (default: false).

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The class name of the root schema.

properties.name: Namespace
properties.help: The namespace of the generated classes.

properties.name: RequiredPropertiesMustBeDefined
properties.help: Specifies whether a required property must be defined in JSON (sets Required.Always when the property is required).

tasks.help: Generates TypeScript interfaces from a JSON Schema.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The type name of the root schema.

tasks.help: Generates CSharp client code from a Swagger/OpenAPI specification.
Generates CSharp client code from a Swagger/OpenAPI specification (obsolete: use openapi2csclient instead).

properties.name: ClientBaseClass
properties.help: The client base class (empty for no base class).

properties.name: ClientClassAccessModifier
properties.help: The client class access modifier (default: public).

properties.name: ConfigurationClass
properties.help: The configuration class. The setting ClientBaseClass must be set. (empty for no configuration class).

properties.name: ContractsNamespace
properties.help: The contracts .NET namespace.

properties.name: ContractsOutput
properties.help: The contracts output file path (optional, if no path is set then a single file with the implementation and contracts is generated).

properties.name: DisposeHttpClient
properties.help: Specifies whether to dispose the HttpClient (injected HttpClient is never disposed).

properties.name: ExceptionClass
properties.help: The exception class (default 'SwaggerException', may use '{controller}' placeholder).

properties.name: ExposeJsonSerializerSettings
properties.help: Specifies whether to expose the JsonSerializerSettings property (default: false).

properties.name: GenerateBaseUrlProperty
properties.help: Specifies whether to generate the BaseUrl property, must be defined on the base class otherwise (default: true).

properties.name: GenerateClientClasses
properties.help: Specifies whether generate client classes.

properties.name: GenerateClientInterfaces
properties.help: Specifies whether generate interfaces for the client classes.

properties.name: GenerateContractsOutput
properties.help: Specifies whether to generate contracts output (interface and models in a separate file set with the ContractsOutput parameter).

properties.name: GenerateExceptionClasses
properties.help: Specifies whether to generate exception classes (default: true).

properties.name: GenerateSyncMethods
properties.help: Specifies whether to generate synchronous methods (not recommended, default: false).

properties.name: GenerateUpdateJsonSerializerSettingsMethod
properties.help: Generate the UpdateJsonSerializerSettings method (must be implemented in the base class otherwise, default: true).

properties.name: HttpClientType
properties.help: Specifies the HttpClient type. By default the 'System.Net.Http.HttpClient' is used.

properties.name: InjectHttpClient
properties.help: Specifies whether an HttpClient instance is injected (default: true).

properties.name: ParameterDateFormat
properties.help: Specifies the format for Date type method parameters (default: yyyy-MM-dd).

properties.name: ParameterDateTimeFormat
properties.help: Specifies the format for DateTime type method parameters (default: s).

properties.name: ProtectedMethods
properties.help: List of methods with a protected access modifier ('classname.methodname').

properties.name: QueryNullValue
properties.help: The null value used for query parameters which are null (default: '').

properties.name: SerializeTypeInformation
properties.help: Serialize the type information in a $type property (not recommended, also sets TypeNameHandling = Auto, default: true).

properties.name: TypeAccessModifier
properties.help: The DTO class/enum access modifier (default: public).

properties.name: UseBaseUrl
properties.help: Specifies whether to use and expose the base URL (default: true).

properties.name: UseHttpClientCreationMethod
properties.help: Specifies whether to call CreateHttpClientAsync on the base class to create a new HttpClient.

properties.name: UseHttpRequestMessageCreationMethod
properties.help: Specifies whether to call CreateHttpRequestMessageAsync on the base class to create a new HttpRequestMethod.

properties.name: WrapDtoExceptions
properties.help: Specifies whether DTO exceptions are wrapped in a SwaggerException instance (default: true).

tasks.help: Generates CSharp Web API controller code from a Swagger/OpenAPI specification.
Generates CSharp Web API controller code from a Swagger/OpenAPI specification (obsolete: use openapi2cscontroller instead).

properties.name: BasePath
properties.help: The Base path on which the API is served, which is relative to the Host

properties.name: ControllerBaseClass
properties.help: The controller base class (empty for 'ApiController').

properties.name: ControllerStyle
properties.help: The controller generation style (partial, abstract; default: partial).

properties.name: ControllerTarget
properties.help: controller target framework (default: AspNetCore).

properties.name: GenerateModelValidationAttributes
properties.help: Add model validation attributes (default: false).

properties.name: RouteNamingStrategy
properties.help: The strategy for naming controller routes (none, operationid; default: none).

properties.name: UseActionResultType
properties.help: Use ASP.Net Core (2.1) ActionResult type as return type (default: false)

properties.name: UseCancellationToken
properties.help: Add a cancellation token parameter (default: false).

tasks.help: Generates TypeScript client code from a Swagger/OpenAPI specification.
Generates TypeScript client code from a Swagger/OpenAPI specification (obsolete: use openapi2tsclient instead).

properties.name: BaseUrlTokenName
properties.help: The token name for injecting the API base URL string (used in the Angular template, default: 'API_BASE_URL').

properties.name: ClassName
properties.help: The class name of the generated client.

properties.name: ClassTypes
properties.help: The type names which always generate plain TypeScript classes.

properties.name: ClientBaseClass
properties.help: The base class of the generated client classes (optional, must be imported or implemented in the extension code).

properties.name: ConfigurationClass
properties.help: The configuration class. The setting ClientBaseClass must be set. (empty for no configuration class).

properties.name: ConvertConstructorInterfaceData
properties.help: Convert POJO objects in the constructor data to DTO instances (GenerateConstructorInterface must be enabled, default: false).

properties.name: DateTimeType
properties.help: The date time type ('Date', 'MomentJS', 'OffsetMomentJS', 'string').

properties.name: ExceptionClass
properties.help: The exception class (default 'ApiException').

properties.name: ExcludedParameterNames
properties.help: The globally excluded parameter names.

properties.name: ExcludedTypeNames
properties.help: The excluded DTO type names (must be defined in an import or other namespace).

properties.name: ExportTypes
properties.help: Specifies whether the export keyword should be added to all classes, interfaces and enums (default: true).

properties.name: ExtendedClasses
properties.help: The list of extended classes.

properties.name: ExtensionCode
properties.help: The extension code (string or file path).

properties.name: GenerateClientClasses
properties.help: Specifies whether generate client classes.

properties.name: GenerateClientInterfaces
properties.help: Specifies whether generate interfaces for the client classes (default: false).

properties.name: GenerateCloneMethod
properties.help: Specifies whether a clone() method should be generated in the DTO classes (default: false).

properties.name: GenerateConstructorInterface
properties.help: Generate an class interface which is used in the constructor to initialize the class (only available when TypeStyle is Class, default: true).

properties.name: GenerateDefaultValues
properties.help: Specifies whether to generate default values for properties (default: true).

properties.name: GenerateDtoTypes
properties.help: Specifies whether to generate DTO classes.

properties.name: GenerateOptionalParameters
properties.help: Specifies whether to reorder parameters (required first, optional at the end) and generate optional parameters (default: false).

properties.name: GenerateResponseClasses
properties.help: Specifies whether to generate response classes (default: true).

properties.name: HandleReferences
properties.help: Handle JSON references (default: false).

properties.name: HttpClass
properties.help: The Angular HTTP service class (default 'Http', 'HttpClient').

properties.name: ImportRequiredTypes
properties.help: Specifies whether required types should be imported (default: true).

properties.name: InjectionTokenType
properties.help: The Angular injection token type (default 'InjectionToken', 'OpaqueToken').

properties.name: InlineNamedAny
properties.help: Inline named any types (default: false).

properties.name: InlineNamedDictionaries
properties.help: Inline named dictionaries (default: false).

properties.name: MarkOptionalProperties
properties.help: Specifies whether to mark optional properties with ? (default: false).

properties.name: ModuleName
properties.help: The TypeScript module name (default: '', no module).

properties.name: Namespace
properties.help: The TypeScript namespace (default: '', no namespace).

properties.name: NullValue
properties.help: The null value used in object initializers (default 'Undefined', 'Null').

properties.name: OperationGenerationMode
properties.help: The operation generation mode ('SingleClientFromOperationId' or 'MultipleClientsFromPathSegments').

properties.name: PromiseType
properties.help: The promise type ('Promise' or 'QPromise').

properties.name: ProtectedMethods
properties.help: List of methods with a protected access modifier ('classname.methodname').

properties.name: QueryNullValue
properties.help: The null value used for query parameters which are null (default: '').

properties.name: ResponseClass
properties.help: The response class (default 'SwaggerResponse', may use '{controller}' placeholder).

properties.name: RxJsVersion
properties.help: The target RxJs version (default: 6.0).

properties.name: Template
properties.help: The type of the asynchronism handling ('JQueryCallbacks', 'JQueryPromises', 'AngularJS', 'Angular', 'Fetch', 'Aurelia').

properties.name: TypeScriptVersion
properties.help: The target TypeScript version (default: 2.7).

properties.name: TypeStyle
properties.help: The type style (default: Class).

properties.name: UseGetBaseUrlMethod
properties.help: Specifies whether to use the 'getBaseUrl(defaultUrl: string)' method from the base class (default: false).

properties.name: UseSingletonProvider
properties.help: Specifies whether to use the Angular 6 Singleton Provider (Angular template only, default: false).

properties.name: UseTransformOptionsMethod
properties.help: Call 'transformOptions' on the base class or extension class (default: false).

properties.name: UseTransformResultMethod
properties.help: Call 'transformResult' on the base class or extension class (default: false).

properties.name: WrapDtoExceptions
properties.help: Specifies whether DTO exceptions are wrapped in a SwaggerException instance (default: false).

properties.name: WrapResponseMethods
properties.help: List of methods where responses are wrapped ('ControllerName.MethodName', WrapResponses must be true).

properties.name: WrapResponses
properties.help: Specifies whether to wrap success responses to allow full response access (experimental).

inputOutputCommand.name: Input
inputOutputCommand.help: A file path or URL to the data or the JSON data itself.

inputOutputCommand.name: ServiceHost
inputOutputCommand.help: Overrides the service host of the web document (optional, use '.' to remove the hostname).

inputOutputCommand.name: ServiceSchemes
inputOutputCommand.help: Overrides the allowed schemes of the web service (optional, comma separated, 'http', 'https', 'ws', 'wss').

isolatedCommand.name: Assembly
isolatedCommand.help: The path or paths to the .NET assemblies (comma separated).

isolatedCommand.name: AssemblyConfig
isolatedCommand.help: The path to the assembly App.config or Web.config (optional).

isolatedCommand.name: ReferencePaths
isolatedCommand.help: The paths to search for referenced assembly files (comma separated).

isolatedCommand.name: UseNuGetCache
isolatedCommand.help: Determines if local Nuget's cache folder should be put in the ReferencePaths by default

isolatedSwaggerOutputCommand.name: OutputType
isolatedSwaggerOutputCommand.help: Specifies the output schema type, ignored when UseDocumentProvider is enabled (Swagger2|OpenApi3, default: Swagger2).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: AllowNullableBodyParameters
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Nullable body parameters are allowed (ignored when MvcOptions.AllowEmptyInputInBodyModelBinding is available (ASP.NET Core 2.0+), default: true).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: AllowReferencesWithProperties
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Use $ref references even if additional properties are defined on the object (otherwise allOf/oneOf with $ref is used, default: false).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: AspNetCoreEnvironment
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Sets the ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT if provided (default: empty).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: ContractResolver
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: DEPRECATED: The custom IContractResolver implementation type in the form 'assemblyName:fullTypeName' or 'fullTypeName').

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: CreateWebHostBuilderMethod
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The CreateWebHostBuilder method in the form 'assemblyName:fullTypeName.methodName' or 'fullTypeName.methodName'.

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: DefaultDictionaryValueReferenceTypeNullHandling
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The default reference type null handling of dictionary value types (NotNull (default) or Null).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: DefaultEnumHandling
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The default enum handling ('String' or 'Integer'), default: Integer.

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: DefaultPropertyNameHandling
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The default property name handling ('Default' or 'CamelCase').

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: DefaultReferenceTypeNullHandling
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The default reference type null handling (Null (default) or NotNull).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: DefaultResponseReferenceTypeNullHandling
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The default response reference type null handling (default: NotNull (default) or Null).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: DocumentName
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The document name to use in SwaggerDocumentProvider (default: v1).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: DocumentProcessors
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The document processor type names in the form 'assemblyName:fullTypeName' or 'fullTypeName').

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: DocumentTemplate
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Specifies the Swagger document template (may be a path or JSON, default: none).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: ExcludedTypeNames
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The excluded type names (same as JsonSchemaIgnoreAttribute).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: FlattenInheritanceHierarchy
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Flatten the inheritance hierarchy instead of using allOf to describe inheritance (default: false).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: GenerateAbstractProperties
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Generate abstract properties (i.e. interface and abstract properties. Properties may defined multiple times in a inheritance hierarchy, default: false).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: GenerateAbstractSchemas
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Generate the x-abstract flag on schemas (default: true).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: GenerateEnumMappingDescription
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Generate a description with number to enum name mappings (for integer enums only, default: false).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: GenerateKnownTypes
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Generate schemas for types in KnownTypeAttribute attributes (default: true).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: GenerateXmlObjects
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Generate xmlObject representation for definitions (default: false).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: IgnoreObsoleteProperties
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Ignore properties with the ObsoleteAttribute (default: false).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: InfoDescription
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Specify the description of the Swagger specification (ignored when DocumentTemplate is set).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: InfoTitle
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Specify the title of the Swagger specification (ignored when DocumentTemplate is set).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: InfoVersion
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Specify the version of the Swagger specification (default: 1.0.0, ignored when DocumentTemplate is set).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: OperationProcessors
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The operation processor type names in the form 'assemblyName:fullTypeName' or 'fullTypeName').

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: SchemaNameGenerator
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The custom ISchemaNameGenerator implementation type in the form 'assemblyName:fullTypeName' or 'fullTypeName').

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: SerializerSettings
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The custom JsonSerializerSettings implementation type in the form 'assemblyName:fullTypeName' or 'fullTypeName').

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: ServiceBasePath
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The basePath of the Swagger specification (optional).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: ServiceHost
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Overrides the service host of the web service (optional, use '.' to remove the hostname).

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: ServiceSchemes
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Overrides the allowed schemes of the web service (optional, comma separated, 'http', 'https', 'ws', 'wss').

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: Startup
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The Startup class type in the form 'assemblyName:fullTypeName' or 'fullTypeName'.

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: TypeNameGenerator
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: The custom ITypeNameGenerator implementation type in the form 'assemblyName:fullTypeName' or 'fullTypeName').

openApiGeneratorCommand.name: UseDocumentProvider
openApiGeneratorCommand.help: Generate document using SwaggerDocumentProvider (configuration from AddOpenApiDocument()/AddSwaggerDocument(), most CLI settings will be ignored).

codeGeneratorCommand.name: EnumNameGeneratorType
codeGeneratorCommand.help: The custom IEnumNameGenerator implementation type in the form 'assemblyName:fullTypeName' or 'fullTypeName').

codeGeneratorCommand.name: PropertyNameGeneratorType
codeGeneratorCommand.help: The custom IPropertyNameGenerator implementation type in the form 'assemblyName:fullTypeName' or 'fullTypeName').

codeGeneratorCommand.name: TypeNameGenerator
codeGeneratorCommand.help: The custom ITypeNameGenerator implementation type in the form 'assemblyName:fullTypeName' or 'fullTypeName').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: AdditionalContractNamespaceUsages
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The additional contract namespace usages.

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: AdditionalNamespaceUsages
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The additional namespace usages.

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: AnyType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The any .NET type (default: 'object').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: ArrayBaseType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The generic array .NET type (default: 'Collection').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: ArrayInstanceType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The generic array .NET instance type (default: empty = ArrayType).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: ArrayType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The generic array .NET type (default: 'ICollection').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: ClassName
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The class name of the generated client.

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: ClassStyle
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The CSharp class style, 'Poco' or 'Inpc' (default: 'Poco').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: DateTimeType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The date time .NET type (default: 'DateTimeOffset').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: DateType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The date .NET type (default: 'DateTimeOffset').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: DictionaryBaseType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The generic dictionary .NET type (default: 'Dictionary').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: DictionaryInstanceType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The generic dictionary .NET instance type (default: empty = DictionaryType).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: DictionaryType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The generic dictionary .NET type (default: 'IDictionary').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: EnforceFlagEnums
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Specifies whether enums should be always generated as bit flags (default: false).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: ExcludedParameterNames
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The globally excluded parameter names.

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: ExcludedTypeNames
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The excluded DTO type names (must be defined in an import or other namespace).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: GenerateDataAnnotations
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Specifies whether to generate data annotation attributes on DTO classes (default: true).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: GenerateDefaultValues
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Specifies whether to generate default values for properties (may generate CSharp 6 code, default: true).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: GenerateDtoTypes
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Specifies whether to generate DTO classes.

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: GenerateImmutableArrayProperties
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Specifies whether to remove the setter for non-nullable array properties (default: false).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: GenerateImmutableDictionaryProperties
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Specifies whether to remove the setter for non-nullable dictionary properties (default: false).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: GenerateJsonMethods
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Specifies whether to render ToJson() and FromJson() methods for DTOs (default: true).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: GenerateOptionalParameters
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Specifies whether to reorder parameters (required first, optional at the end) and generate optional parameters (default: false).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: GenerateOptionalPropertiesAsNullable
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Specifies whether optional schema properties (not required) are generated as nullable properties (default: false).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: GenerateResponseClasses
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Specifies whether to generate response classes (default: true).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: HandleReferences
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Use preserve references handling (All) in the JSON serializer (default: false).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: InlineNamedAny
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Inline named any types (default: false).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: InlineNamedArrays
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Inline named arrays (default: false).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: InlineNamedDictionaries
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Inline named dictionaries (default: false).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: InlineNamedTuples
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Inline named tuples (default: true).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: JsonConverters
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Specifies the custom Json.NET converter types (optional, comma separated).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: JsonSerializerSettingsTransformationMethod
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The name of a static method which is called to transform the JsonSerializerSettings used in the generated ToJson()/FromJson() methods (default: none).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: Namespace
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The namespace of the generated classes.

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: OperationGenerationMode
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The operation generation mode ('SingleClientFromOperationId' or 'MultipleClientsFromPathSegments').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: ParameterArrayType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The generic array .NET type of operation parameters (default: 'IEnumerable').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: ParameterDictionaryType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The generic dictionary .NET type of operation parameters (default: 'IDictionary').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: RequiredPropertiesMustBeDefined
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Specifies whether a required property must be defined in JSON (sets Required.Always when the property is required).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: ResponseArrayType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The generic array .NET type of operation responses (default: 'ICollection').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: ResponseClass
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The response class (default 'SwaggerResponse', may use '{controller}' placeholder).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: ResponseDictionaryType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The generic dictionary .NET type of operation responses (default: 'IDictionary').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: TimeSpanType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The time span .NET type (default: 'TimeSpan').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: TimeType
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: The time .NET type (default: 'TimeSpan').

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: WrapResponseMethods
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: List of methods where responses are wrapped ('ControllerName.MethodName', WrapResponses must be true).

openApiToCSharpCommand.name: WrapResponses
openApiToCSharpCommand.help: Specifies whether to wrap success responses to allow full response access.
